family.name: totals
family.description:
The totals resource calculates the total costs for:
* **[cart][carts]** * **[line-item][carts]** * **[order][orders]** * **[shipment][shipments]** * **[shipment-line-item][shipments]**
[carts]: #carts [orders]: #orders [shipments]: #shipments

resource.name: cart-line-item-total
resource.description: The cart line item total resource.

resource.name: shipment-line-item-total
resource.description: The shipment line item total resource.

relationship.name: total-for-cart
relationship.description: Retrieve the total cost of all cart line items before cart total discounts are applied.

relationship.name: total-for-cart-line-item
relationship.description: Retrieve the total cost of a single cart line item before cart line item discounts are applied.

relationship.name: total-for-order
relationship.description: Retrieve the total cost of the shopper's order including taxes and shipping costs.

relationship.name: total-for-shipment
relationship.description: Retrieve the total cost for a shipment.

relationship.name: total-for-shipment-line-item
relationship.description: Retrieve the total cost for a shipment line item.

property.name: cost
property.description: The total costs. This is an array because the total cost have multiple currencies. For example, $20 USD + 20,000 loyalty points.
